Params: {1: 'Like, really upon the time—around an hour ago!', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'In the beginning God (made of cogs, rods, and a M.I.N.D.!) said...', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'And God said, "Aight \'s \'nuff, time to get genesisisizing."', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'And God made everything else and whatever.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'The three swimsuits became the light of the world, the summer seas, and hope for all that is good.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '——Geneseas Chapter 1, as presented by the most esteemed and cutest bard in the party, Nanami.', 2: '000000ff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And so, wars waged around the trinity of swimsuits...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'After all, becoming hope for all that is good means that—ack—cough, cough!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ahah. My good minstrel. Always there for me!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "I'm not your minstrel. I'm just here to play house with you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "That won't do! A great bard always come with a great sideki—I mean, minstrel!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "I've never heard of something like that before... And I'm...", 4: '1'}
{3: '——Anyhow, thus marks the turbulent beginnings of this epic tale.'}
{3: 'And today, through the hot and bothered and desirous prayers of people screaming "Beach episode!", the three guardians enter the stage.'}
{3: 'They bear with them the beliefs of the swimsuit they vowed to protect. They extend the age of fire that is summer.'}
{3: 'Their legacy is named... the "Endless Eight Corridor".'}
{3: "Now, let's take a glimpse at the three chosen ones..."}
{3: "Swimsuits are made to feel God's tears in full. To her, swimsuits must be made to dive."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Only the deep sea is worthy of this hot summer. A cycle—from the beginning to the end.', 4: '1'}
{3: '——The drifter of the tracks and the sea. The Rational Rammer. His name is... Lee.'}
{3: 'Offering his sincerest prayers to the Sharolla-Turbo-TGT-MAX athletic swimsuit, he tirelessly performs his training ritual to perfect his track time.'}
{3: "——The Burning Musume. The fanatic. She's happy and she knows it."}
{3: '...Nothing much to say about her except screams of "BUUUURN BABY BUUUUURN!!!"'}
{3: 'And so... Our actual protagonist finally makes her entry...!'}
{3: 'In this forbidden corner of the world, in the depths of the crimson abyss, "she" sleeps...'}
{3: 'And "her" owner arrives. With only one purpose in M.I.N.D.—to burn up even this burning summer.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'When the guardians fall, the three sandy hallows will unite in the hands of one, putting an end to summer... That is what I was told.', 4: '1'}
{3: '～Born beneath the ocean waves, the mighty storm of swimsuit country～'}
{3: '～She knows every trick under the sea! To save the ocean from humanity～'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '...Why are you singing all of a sudden?'}
{3: 'Saying so, "Lucia" marshals through the fields alone. Two dark shades suddenly pop up from the sand, blocking her path.'}
{2: '???A', 3: 'Mwahaha——What have we here? A maiden all alone?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???B', 3: 'Nyahaha——Does she not know that bad and corrupt people dwell in hot summer fields?', 4: '2'}
{2: '???B', 3: 'Nyahaha——We must have scared her pants off!', 4: '2'}
{2: '???B', 3: "We'll tell you! Listen closely... Prepare for trou—", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Levi said this... "A reply too late is the same as coconut milk left open for a week."'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I will be the one to end all swimsuits.'}
{2: '???A', 3: "Mwah! It's a swimsuit! She's a swimsuit wearer!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'While "Lucia" stands, silent, and definitely not looking at the explosion.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...Levi, you can't munch on their souls."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The real fight has yet to come. I can't have you getting a tummy ache before that."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leviathan', 3: "...Yeah, yeah. Then I'll be sucking double the usual from you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...How long until we reach the domain of the swimsuit guardians?'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Then mind not to drain too much of my vital fluids. I can't be all dry when I'm fighting the guardians."}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: "...Fine. But after everything's over, I'll suck my rightful share—with interest.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: 'When enough vital fluids course through my fiber vessels, I can remake a new body for myself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: 'And our pact too, will end then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: "What's the matter? You aren't those who get high from getting their fluids sucked, are you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm just thinking... Will this really end the way you said it would?"}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: 'Don\'t fret. I\'m "that which does not exist in this swimsuit world." Which means that, the swimsuits here are no match for me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: 'As for you, you require the three swimsuits to travel to the next world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: 'Which means that, our goals are aligned. At least for now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: 'Honestly, grab some sleep instead of worrying about the whatnots.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leviathan', 3: "When the real battle begins, you won't have time for sleep.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Why is the main character sleeping, when the story has just begun?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I... I'm not done with the script yet!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'She went playing with Nanami somewhere just now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Should I tell the others to keep an eye out for her?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Somewhere far above... In a high place that can take in the entirety of the beach and the waterpark...'}
{2: 'α', 3: '...Babylonia brought fuel and explosives to the beach?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Operation's over, but I guess it doesn't hurt to be diligent about them.", 4: '1'}
